alert.note: Alert for Dale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 4:42PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Dale County through 515 PM CDT... At 441 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Newton, or 7 miles southeast of Ozark, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Daleville, Ozark, Fort Rucker, Midland City, Newton, Pinckard, Grimes, Napier Field, Sylvan Grove, Hunt Field, Waterford, Dean Church Road, Hooper Stage Field, Knox Field, Bagwells Crossroads, Kelly, Ewell, Browns Crossroads, Cairns Aaf and Goldberg Field. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
